title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s
medium:
Medium: wool, glass beads, faux pearls, metal thread
Technique: embroidery on twill and plain weaves
description: Pieced fuschia and burgandy fabrics with embroidery worked at the join. The incomplete floral motif is worked in gold and fuschia seed beads, faux pearls, and rhinestones. Motif is outlined with row of chain stitch worked in metal thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s. Medium: wool, glass beads, faux pearls, metal thread
Technique: embroidery on twill and plain weaves. 
Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-40
